author: Visual Studio Code Team
description: A sync implementation of the VS Code API. Only supported from a worker in NodeJS and browser
name: @vscode/sync-api-service

scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.all:publish: git clean -xfd . && npm install && npm run compile:publish && npm run lint && cd ../sync-api-tests && npm run all:publish && cd ..
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "⛔ Can only publish from a secure pipeline ⛔" && node ../build/npm/fail
